name: They will be alive! (Of course if you save them)
name_original: They will be alive! (Of course if you save them)
description:
This game created over the weekend!
It was a stressful enough, but I create all graphics(except UI and Effects) and game logic by my own.

The idea is simple. You have a tribe with creatures and they can product gold or food by using certain buildings. And if food is won't be enough for creatures by the end of the day, some of them are die. 

Gold is needed to improve some stats to improve next session(rogue-lite style) - BUT THIS FEATURE IS NOT FINISHED. :(

Another aspect of the game is that from time to time hostile creatures attacks your creatures, and for defending you should use gun. In plan - it was a separate building.

There is no polish and can be some bugs
Also game without sounds :(

Controls:

Mouse Tap - on building

WASD - move crossfire

Space - Shoot a bullet
